price: 151. Alobi (Mûssa): Nkolo wa ngai, limbisa ngai na ndeko wa ngai, mpe kotisa biso na ngolu nayo, yo nde ozali ngolu wa bangolu koleka.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِأَخِي وَأَدۡخِلۡنَا فِي رَحۡمَتِكَۖ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
